Room.Name: Phexton Road
Room.ShortDescription: Phexton Road South continues to the east and west.
Room.LongDescription: The great, brown wall on the south side of the road is much higher here than most of the wall. Strange that the builders would deliberately make this section so much different from the rest of the uniform wall. A series of steps will take you to the top, if you desire to go that way. There used to be a village law about citizens climbing up there, but then the elders decided there was no harm in it, so feel free to climb if you desire.
